John O
Agwunobi bụ onye Scotland amụrụ Naijiria-Amerika onye bụbu onye ọrụ gọvmentị US, onye dibia bekee zụrụ nke ọma na onye isi ọrụ na onye isi oche nke Herbalife Nutrition.
Ọ bụbu onye isi osote onye isi oche Walmart na onye isi ala azụmaahịa ahụike na ịdị mma nke onye na-ere ahịa site na 2007 ruo 2014
Agwunobi jere ozi dịka osote odeakwụkwọ maka ahụike maka ngalaba ahụike na ọrụ mmadụ na US ma bụrụkwa ode akwụkwọ ahụike na ahụike steeti Florida site na 2000 ruo 2005
A mụrụ Agwunobi na Dundee, Scotland site na nna Naijiria nke sitere na agbụrụ Igbo, bụ onye dibịa nke Britain zụrụ azụ, na nne Scotland
Mgbe Agwunobi nọ na ntorobịa, ezinụlọ Agwunobi kwagara Naijiria, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na mahadum
Ọ nwetara ọzụzụ ahụike na Mahadum Jos, ebe nna ya bụ prọfesọ nke nkà mmụta ọgwụ
Nwanne ya, Andrew Agwunobi, bụ CEO nke UConn Health na nwa oge president nke Mahadum Connecticut

Agwunobi nwere nzere masta na ahụike ọha site na Mahadum Johns Hopkins, onye isi nchịkwa azụmaahịa sitere na Mahadum Georgetown, yana asambodo dị ka onye isi nlekọta nlekọta sitere na American Association of Health Plans (AAHP)
Ọ dechara ebe obibi ụmụaka ya na Hospitallọ Ọgwụ Mahadum Howard dị na Washington, DC, na-atụgharị n'etiti ụlọ ọgwụ mba ụmụaka na District nke Columbia General Hospital.
Tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ na gọvmentị etiti, Agwunobi jere ozi dịka odeakwụkwọ ahụike Florida n'okpuru Gọvanọ Jeb Bush site na afo 2000 ruo 2005
O duuru nzaghachi ahụike ọha na Florida maka nnukwu ajọ ifufe anọ wakporo steeti ahụ na 2004

Na mgbakwunye, Agwunobi duuru nzaghachi nke ngalaba ahụ maka mbuso agha anthrax nke mba mbụ, mechaa duzie mbọ steeti ahụ ejiri mara mba ahụ iji kwado maka, igbochi na ibelata mmetụta nke mwakpo iyi ọha egwu
Agwunobi jere ozi dị ka 12th assistant Secretary for Health (ASH) site na Jenụwarị 4, 2006 ruo Septemba 4, 2007
Ndị Sineti kwadoro ya maka ọnọdụ ahụ na Disemba 17, 2005

N'ime oge ya dị ka ASH, ọ na-ahụ maka Ụlọ Ọrụ Maka Nchịkwa Ọrịa, Ụlọ Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Ahụ Ike Mba, Nchịkwa nri na ọgwụ ọjọọ, ụlọ ọrụ nke US Surgeon General na onye òtù United States Public Health Service Commissioned Corps, ọrụ uwe., ma nwee ọkwa nke admiral kpakpando anọ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya US na bọọdụ ndị isi nke Òtù Ahụ Ike Ụwa
Agwunobi abụrụla osote onye isi oche United States African Development Foundation
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ụlọ ọrụ na Shopko, ụlọ ahịa na-ere ahịa ọpụrụiche na-ejide ụlọ ọrụ na onye isi oche maka Ọrụ Ahụike Magellan
Na Septemba 2007, a mara ọkwa Agwunobi dị ka onye ọkachamara ahụike Walmart na-arụ ọrụ ịgbasa uto nke onye na-ere ahịa n'ime azụmaahịa ahụike na ịdị mma
Ọ duru otu ndị ọrụ karịrị 65,000 na ụlọ ahịa ọgwụ ụlọ ọrụ, ebe ọhụụ na ụlọọgwụ ahụike
Agwunobi mechara bụrụ onye isi osote onye isi ala Walmart, ebe ọ "chụpụrụ ụgwọ ọgwụ ndenye ma nyekwa ego na-aga n'ihu site na onyinye ụlọ ọgwụ anyị" tupu ọ pụọ na 2014
N'afọ 2016, Agwunobi sonyeere Herbalife Nutrition, ụlọ ọrụ na-ere ahịa ọtụtụ ọkwa dị na California, dịka onye isi ahụike na nri nri
Ọ ghọrọ onye isi oche na 2018 wee mara ọkwa dị ka onye isi oche na onye isi oche na-esote na Machị 2020
Ka o mechara ọrụ a, Agwunobi kwuru na ya ga-etinye anya n'itinye ego ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na njikwa ibu na ịrụ ọrụ egwuregwu
Àtụ:United States Assistant Secretary for Health
